channel.title: Posts on notes.tiago.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on notes.tiago.dev

item.title: First Week @ HomeTeam GameDev
item.description: This is exactly what I had been looking for. So far, it is much better than I thought it would have been.

item.title: Career Panel @ Geeking Out Kids of Color
item.description: yesterday I attended a career panel to mentor and give advice to college studends via GOKiC’s network. It was great! ‚ù§

item.title: The gito alias
item.description: I often need to open a repo’s webpage to look at PRs, get code reference to others and many other reasons. So I created an alias that makes navigating from my terminal to the repo’s webpage super easy.

item.title: The Mental Load : What do Women think about?
item.description: I have recently read ‘The Mental Load: A Feminist Comic’ By Emma and I learned a lot! As I read each chapter, I took notes and today I reflected on them. I highly recommend this book to the women and men of your life.

item.title: Perspective Wand : Experiencing Superluminal in VR
item.description: I saw a really cool game and I thought its game mechanic was incredible. I wondered how it would feel in the real world. So I recreated it in VR!

item.title: My first table!
item.description: I noticed my work desk was bending after a few months of holding my work desktop that I had to bring home due to covid-19. So I decided to build myself a very sturdy table!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: of course my first post would have this title. üòõ
